items.sentence: Please leave a message after the beep or drop some candies in our mailbox.
Tom returned to his hometown to visit his parents during the summer break.
The tea I drank at Tom's house yesterday was the best tea I've ever drunk.
Tom told Mary about something that happened to him while he was in Boston.
You look like a kid that just got caught with his hands in the cookie jar.
My friend broke up with his girlfriend and now he wants to go out with me.
Tom was responsible for more than one significant scientific breakthrough.
Some of the most sociable people I know have friends both online and off-.
You're the only person I know who doesn't knock before entering my office.
I could've been finished doing that by 2:30 if I'd worked a little faster.
